entry.title: Services.uz
entry.content:
Bizning Xizmatlarimiz

Obsidian Asosidagi Veb-saytlar

Bilimingizni chiroyli va funksional veb-saytga aylantiring. Hujjatlar, vikilar va shaxsiy bilimlarni boshqarish uchun ajoyib yechim.

Batafsil →

To'liq Stack Dasturlash

G'oyadan tortib ishga tushirishgacha bo'lgan barcha bosqichlarni o'z ichiga olgan veb-dasturlash xizmatlari. Sizning ehtiyojlaringizga moslashtirilgan, moslashuvchan va yuqori samaradorlikdagi veb-ilovalar yaratamiz.

Batafsil →

Telegram Bot Yaratish

Ishlarni avtomatlashtirish, foydalanuvchilar bilan muloqotni osonlashtirish va biznes jarayonlarini takomillashtirish uchun moslashtirilgan Telegram botlari. Oddiy chatbotlardan tortib murakkab biznes yechimlarigacha.

Batafsil →

Sun'iy Intellekt va Avtomatlashtirish

Biznesingiz samaradorligini oshirish uchun sun'iy intellekt va avtomatlashtirish kuchidan foydalaning. Biz eng yangi AI yechimlarini integratsiya qilamiz.

Batafsil →

Mikroservislar

Biznesingiz bilan birga rivojlanadigan mikroservislar arxitekturasi. Mustaqil ishlaydigan, mustahkam va o'zaro muvofiqlashgan xizmatlar yaratamiz.

Batafsil →

entry.title: Services.en
entry.content:
Our Services

Obsidian-Powered Websites

Transform your knowledge base into a beautiful, functional website with our Obsidian-powered solutions. Perfect for documentation, wikis, and personal knowledge management.

Learn More →

Full Stack Development

End-to-end web development services from concept to deployment. We build responsive, scalable, and high-performance web applications tailored to your needs.

Learn More →

Telegram Bot Development

Custom Telegram bots to automate tasks, engage users, and streamline communication. From simple chatbots to complex business automation solutions.

Learn More →

AI & Automation

Leverage the power of AI and automation to optimize your business processes. We integrate cutting-edge AI solutions to drive efficiency and innovation.

Learn More →

Microservices

Scalable and maintainable microservices architecture designed to grow with your business. We build robust, independent services that work together seamlessly.

Learn More →

entry.title: Why you should choose me?.en
entry.content:
Why Clients Will Choose ME Over Any Other Web Developer

  • You wake up tomorrow with a real, live, public website already online – no waiting weeks, no back-and-forth, no “learning curve”. I deliver it 100 % ready in 24–48 hours.
  • Zero recurring costs forever: no hosting bills, no WordPress updates, no plugin subscriptions. GitHub Pages = free for life.
  • You keep 100 % ownership and control – everything lives in your own GitHub account (not mine, not some shady agency server).
  • I set it up so you never touch code again if you don’t want to. You just open Obsidian (the app you probably already love) → write or drag-and-drop → save → your site updates automatically in seconds.

Why Obsidian Is the Perfect Brain for Your Website

  • You already think in notes and links – Obsidian is the best tool on earth for that.
  • Write once, publish everywhere: the same vault becomes your personal knowledge base AND your public website.
  • Beautiful typography, instant search, tags, backlinks, graph view – all work on the live site with zero extra plugins.
  • Works offline, syncs with your phone, supports folders, images, PDFs, embeds, everything you already use.
  • Future-proof: if you ever outgrow it, your content is just Markdown files – you can move anywhere tomorrow.

Why GitHub + GitHub Pages Beats Every Other Option

What People Usually Pay For Monthly Cost Your Cost With My Service
Shared hosting + WordPress $5–30/mo $0 forever
Netlify / Vercel (free tier) $0–20/mo $0 forever
Custom domain (you bring it) $12/year Same $12/year
Security updates, backups, plugins Hours of work Handled automatically
  • GitHub Pages is powered by the same infrastructure that runs millions of sites – rock-solid, globally fast, HTTPS by default.
  • Automatic HTTPS certificate, automatic scaling, 99.99 % uptime – better than most paid hosts.
  • Built-in version history: break something? Just click “revert” in GitHub. No backups to manage.

Why So Incredibly Cheap ($5–10 range)

Because I’m not selling you hosting, servers, or my time forever.
I’m selling you one afternoon of my expertise to save you 50+ hours of frustration and hundreds of dollars per year.

Most freelancers charge $300–$1500 for a custom static site.
I charge less than a dinner for two because:

  • The entire stack is free (GitHub + Obsidian + open-source themes)
  • I reuse the same bulletproof template (customized for you in minutes)
  • My mission is to get as many people as possible publishing this way – the lower the price, the more lives I change.

Who This Is Perfect For (make them see themselves)

  • Writers who are tired of Medium taking their traffic
  • Researchers & students who want a beautiful public vault
  • Indie hackers needing a landing page or documentation site
  • Consultants wanting a clean portfolio without the bloat
  • Anyone who believes their notes deserve to be seen by the world

If you’ve ever thought “I wish my Obsidian notes could just be my website” – this gig turns that wish into reality tomorrow morning.

Ready? Send me your GitHub username (or say “create one for me”) and the site name you want.
I’ll handle everything else and hand you the keys to your new permanent corner of the internet.

Click “Order Now” and tomorrow you’ll have a real website that updates every time you click a button in Obsidian.

entry.title: Home Page.uz
entry.content:
FarGoneE'ga Xush Kelibsiz

Innovatsion Muhandislik, Ta'limda Mukammallik

Xizmatlarimiz Batafsil

Bizning Ustunliklarimiz

Muhandislik

Murakkab muammolarni hal qilish uchun zamonaviy muhandislik yechimlari va innovatsion yondashuvlar.

Ko'proq →

Elektronika

Ishlash sifati va ishonchliligi uchun mo'ljallangan ilg'or elektron tizimlar va komponentlar.

Batafsil →

Ta'lim

Keyingi avlodni rivojlantirish uchun keng qamrovli o'quv resurslari va malaka oshirish dasturlari.

O'rganish →

Mukammallik

Barcha ishlarimizda sifat va doimiy takomillashtirishga sadoqat.

Standartlarimiz →

FarGoneE Haqida

FarGoneE (talaffuzi "Farg'oniy") - bu muhandislik, elektronika, ta'lim va mukammallik kesishmasida faoliyat yurituvchi innovatsion brend. Biz yuqori texnologiyali yechimlar, bilim almashish va ishonchli mutaxassislik xizmatlari orqali yangi ufqlarga erishishga intilamiz.

Tezkor Havolalar

Xizmatlarimiz

Bizning keng qamrovli texnik yechimlar va xizmatlarimiz bilan tanishib chiqing.

O'quv Resurslari

Bizning o'quv qo'llanmalarimiz va darsliklarimizdan foydalaning.

Blog

Bizning so'nggi yangiliklar va fikr-mulohazalarimiz bilan tanishib chiqing.

Bog'lanish

Jamoamiz bilan bog'laning.

entry.content:
Welcome to FarGoneE

Engineering Innovation, Educational Excellence

Our Services Learn More

Our Pillars

Engineering

Cutting-edge solutions and innovative engineering approaches to solve complex problems.

Explore →

Electronics

Advanced electronic systems and components designed for performance and reliability.

Discover →

Learn →

Excellence

Our Standards →

About FarGoneE

FarGoneE (pronounced "Farg'oniy") is a dynamic, innovative brand at the intersection of Engineering, Electronics, Education, and Excellence. We are committed to pushing boundaries through high-tech solutions, knowledge-sharing, and reliable expertise.

entry.title: Basic.uz
entry.content:
Obsidian — Boshlovchilar uchun qo'llanma (O'zbek tilida)

Mundarija

001. Yangi hamyon ochish (Yangi Vault yaratish)
002. O'zbek Tiliga O'tish
003. Yangi Eslatma Yaratish
004. Sarlavhalar Bilan Ishlash
005. Qalin Matn Yozish
006. Qiya Matn Yozish
007. Ustiga Chizilgan Matn
008. Matnni Belgilash (Highlight)
009. Tez Formatlash
010. Gorizontal Chiziq
011. Blok Iqtibos Yaratish
012. Tartiblanmagan Ro'yxat
013. Tartiblangan Ro'yxat
014. Ro'yxat Sathini O'zgartirish
015. Checkbox Vazifalar (Task)
016. Tashqi Havola Qo'yish
017. Oddiy Ichki Link
018. Nomlangan Ichki Link
019. Sarlavhaga Link Berish
020. Eslatmani Biriktirish (Embed)
021. Kod Bloklari Yaratish
022. Jadval Qo'shish
023. Media Uchun Papka Tayyorlash
024. Musiqa Biriktirish
025. Video Biriktirish
026. PDF Biriktirish
027. Rasm Biriktirish
028. Xarita Biriktirish (Obsidian Maps yoki oddiy)
029. Konvert Bloklari (Callouts)
030. Mermaid Diagrammalar
031. Matematik Ifodalar

[!warning] Eslatma:

Quyida sintaksis namunalari berilgan. Foydalanish vaqtida ulardan ba'zilari ``` (uchtalik tirnoq) bilan o'ralishi kerak. Bu kabilar #UchtalikTirnoqIchida tegi bilan belgilangan.

001. Yangi hamyon ochish (Yangi Vault yaratish)

Mundarija ga o'tish

entry.title: Basic.en
entry.content:
Obsidian Beginner’s Guide (English) – Clean & Visual

Index

001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute
002. Switch to Uzbek Language Fast
003. Create New Note in One Click
004. Headings with Hash Levels
005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian
006. How to Write Italic Text Fast
007. Strikethrough Text Tutorial
008. Highlight Important Text Easily
009. Toolbar Quick Formatting Tips
010. Horizontal Divider Line in Obsidian
011. Block Quotes for Better Notes
012. Bulleted Lists in Obsidian
013. Numbered Lists Step by Step
014. Indent and Outdent Lists
015. Task Checkboxes in Obsidian
016. Add External Links Correctly
017. Simple Internal Links Wiki Style
018. Aliased Internal Links
019. Link to Headings Inside Note
020. Embed Notes with Exclamation
021. Code Blocks and Syntax Highlight
022. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast
023. Assets Folder Setup
024. Embed Audio Files in Notes
025. Embed Local Video Files Easily
026. Embed PDF Documents in Obsidian
027. Add and Embed Images Properly
028. Embed Maps
029. Callouts for Beautiful Notes
030. Flowcharts and Diagrams (Mermaid)
031. Math in Obsidian (LaTeX)

[!warning] Reminder:

Below syntax examples are given. Some of them should be wrapped with two ``` backticks when using. They are marked as #InsideTripleBacktics in examples.
